metadata.Title: CVE-2023-31081 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in drivers/media/test-drivers/vidtv/vidtv_bridge.c in the Linux kernel 6.2. There is a NULL pointer dereference in vidtv_mux_stop_thread. In vidtv_stop_streaming, after dvb->mux=NULL occurs, it executes vidtv_mux_stop_thread(dvb->mux).

notes.Note: sbeattie> v4l test drivers, specifically the DVB test drivers. These are only built when the CONFIG_DVB_TEST_DRIVERS kernel config option is enabled, which is not enabled in any supported Ubuntu kernel configuration. Therefore, Ubuntu kernels are not affected. unfixed upstream as of 2023.10.16
